ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: Now wouldn t it be interesting if they introduced slow songs that stacked? Have 6 Bards in your raid, each play a 05% slow on top of a Shammies slow and the
ygData.messageBody:
Now wouldn't it be interesting if they introduced slow songs that stacked?
Have 6 Bards in your raid, each play a 05% slow on top of a Shammies slow
and the Bards have added some real value. Since the stacking would be
relative you'd only get down to about 35% speed versus 10%, but that would
still be phenomenal

Tzeetch

--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
wrote:

Actually the Ervaj songs (50 and 60) do stack with all forms of haste,
spell/song or item, so they can do it if they wanted to.
